welcomeHeaderSubTitle: Create and equip a room correctly.
welcomeBuyerAttractionGoodServiceHeader: We will help you choose furniture
welcomeBuyerAttractionGoodServiceDescrip:
We provide a convenient service for creating room with the best,
			most beautiful and most importantly - your chosen furniture.
welcomeBuyerAttractionBigBaseHeader: With us you will find exactly what you want
welcomeBuyerAttractionBigBaseDescription:
Yes it's true! We are a constantly expanding marketplace. Our user
			will always find the goods to their liking!
welcomeBuyerReviewLeftDescription: This is what clients say about us.!
welcomeBuyerReviewRightHeader: "It took me one hour to furnish my rooms with the furniture I needed. 5 minutes after placing the order I was contacted and agreed on the delivery."
welcomeBuyerReviewRightDescription: Ivanov Ivan, the happy owner of furniture
welcomeSellerAttractionHeader: We also offer an excellent opportunity for sellers to sell their goods.
welcomeSellerAttractionDescription: If you have furniture and you want to sell it - we will help you. CRAB - an aggregator that sells your products for you! Just upload your products, we take care of the rest!
welcomeSellerReviewLeftHeader: "I was surprised when the flow of customers doubled! The sale of goods has improved thanks to this site!"
welcomeSellerReviewRightHeader: "A good place to sell your products!"
